Texts.Chs: 真棒。你应该会需要很多^green;高级塑料^reset;，所以请随时保证储量！接下来，让我们帮你在黑暗中视物，怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Bravo. You'll need a ^green;lot of plastic^reset; so keep stocked! Now let's help you see in the dark, shall we?

Texts.Chs: 太棒了。现在你有了^orange;基因合成器^reset;，那么就可以真正的开始我们的工作了！那么，第一株植株……我想也许你会想要制作一棵^orange;蕨树^reset;，因为你可以从蕨树采集到真丝纤维，而真丝纤维则可用于制作^green;高级塑料^reset;。如果你缺少高级塑料，你将寸步难行。
Texts.Eng: Sweet. Now that you have a ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset; we can really get working! The first plant you'll probably want to make is the ^orange;bracken tree^reset;, as the silk it creates ultimately leads to ^green;advanced plastic^reset;. Without plastic, you're sunk.
